titles: Irelands complaint of the armies hypocrisie. With his Excellencies entring unconquer'd London in a discourse between two freinds [sic] Donatus and Perigrin. With the slighting of the communicable line.
notes: Verse - "Well met friend Perigrin, from whence cam'st thou,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
